name: Speed Muscle Car Driving
description:
Take yourself on an muscle cars driving racing experience! If you think you have a great taste in American muscle cars and you can do some neat racing and drifting stunts then this game is perfect for you! Accelerate in the suburban areas and dodge other cars while racing and drifting to the top.

Features:
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Best selection of classic muscle car
- High detailed race tracks
- Tilt, button, steer controls option
- Many camera modes for car driver
